meanings.definition: To distribute or assign a portion
meanings.sent1: She allotted the candies to each child equally.
meanings.sent2: The teacher allotted time for each student to present their project.
meanings.sent3: The chef allotted the ingredients for the recipe but forgot the main one!
meanings.sent4: The captain allotted tasks to the crew like a commander on a battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The farmer allotted seeds to each row with precision and care.

meanings.definition: To set aside for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: He allotted a portion of his savings for a new bike.
meanings.sent2: The team allotted funds for the upcoming charity event.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel allotted nuts for winter but kept forgetting where they were hidden.
meanings.sent4: She allotted time for self-care like a precious gift to herself.
meanings.sent5: The architect allotted space for a garden in the building design, creating a peaceful oasis.
